ResourceHeader.ResourceName: TIMED SEE Level2 EGS Solar Irradiance Data

RevisionEvent.Note: Only known prior ReleaseDate of the metadata

Added PublicationInfo. Added ResourceType and NamingAuthority. Changed http to https in top-level schemaLocation attribute. Fixed version number separator in top-level schemaLocation attribute. Matched version number in schemaLocation attribute to updated value in Version tag. ZCB

ResourceHeader.Description: The EUV Grating Spectrograph (EGS) aboard SEE performs measurements of the Sun for about 3 minutes every orbit (97 minutes) which usually gives 14-15 measurements per day. The Level 2 data is time averaged over the entire day, after being 1-AU corrected and removing flares. The 1-AU correction is provided.

PublicationInfo.PublishedBy: Johns Hopkins University Applied Physics Laboratory

AccessURL.Name: SEE Data Products web page
AccessURL.Description: This web page allows the request of data files for this product. To request data: for the EGS data type of interest, click the year of interest to go the the ftp directory of files and download the desired day-long file by clicking on it.

NumericalData.ProviderResourceName: SEE Level 2 EGS Solar Irradiance data

Parameter.Name: Wavelength intervals
Parameter.Description: Array of wavelength intervals, half-Angstrom centers

Structure.Description: Dimensions: [Number_of_wavelength_intervals] - where Number_of_wavelength_intervals is the number of wavelength intervals.

Parameter.Name: EGS median solar irradiance
Parameter.Description: Array of median solar irradiances for each wavelength interval. This is the spectrum.

Structure.Description: Dimensions: [Number_of_wavelength_intervals] - where Number_of_wavelength_intervals is the number of wavelength intervals.

Parameter.Name: Differences between the median and weighted averaged solar irradiances
Parameter.Description: Array of differences between the median and weighted averaged solar irradiances for each wavelength interval

Structure.Description: Dimensions: [Number_of_wavelength_intervals] - where Number_of_wavelength_intervals is the number of wavelength intervals.
Dimensions: [Number_of_wavelength_intervals] - where Number_of_wavelength_intervals is the number of wavelength intervals.
Dimensions: [Number_of_wavelength_intervals] - where Number_of_wavelength_intervals is the number of wavelength intervals.
Dimensions: [Number_of_wavelength_intervals] - where Number_of_wavelength_intervals is the number of wavelength intervals.

Parameter.Name: Number of points used in determining the daily average
Parameter.Description: Array of the Number of points (1-Angstrom-gridded measurements) used in determining the daily average for each wavelength interval

Structure.Description: Dimensions: [Number_of_wavelength_intervals] - where Number_of_wavelength_intervals is the number of wavelength intervals.

Parameter.Name: Order Sorting correction applied to flux_median
Parameter.Description: Order Sorting correction applied to flux_median

Structure.Description: Dimensions: [Number_of_wavelength_intervals] - where Number_of_wavelength_intervals is the number of wavelength intervals.

Parameter.Name: Order Sorting correction applied to weighted avg irradiance
Parameter.Description: Order Sorting correction applied to weighted avg irradiance

Structure.Description: Dimensions: [Number_of_wavelength_intervals] - where Number_of_wavelength_intervals is the number of wavelength intervals.

Parameter.Name: Degradation function linear extrapolation/interpolation flag
Parameter.Description: Long value = 1 if degradation function is linearly extrapolated, 0 if linearly interpolated

Parameter.Name: Averaged atmospheric correction factors
Parameter.Description: Array of Averaged atmospheric correction factors for each wavelength interval

Structure.Description: Dimensions: [Number_of_wavelength_intervals] - where Number_of_wavelength_intervals is the number of wavelength intervals.

Parameter.Name: Minimum atmospheric correction factors
Parameter.Description: Array of Minimum atmospheric correction factors

Structure.Description: Dimensions: [Number_of_wavelength_intervals] - where Number_of_wavelength_intervals is the number of wavelength intervals.

Parameter.Name: Maximum atmospheric correction factors
Parameter.Description: Array of Maximum atmospheric correction factors

Structure.Description: Dimensions: [Number_of_wavelength_intervals] - where Number_of_wavelength_intervals is the number of wavelength intervals.

Parameter.Name: Average instrument degradation correction factors
Parameter.Description: Array of Average instrument degradation correction factors

Structure.Description: Dimensions: [Number_of_wavelength_intervals] - where Number_of_wavelength_intervals is the number of wavelength intervals.

Parameter.Name: Minimum instrument degradation correction factors
Parameter.Description: Array of Minimum instrument degradation correction factors

Structure.Description: Dimensions: [Number_of_wavelength_intervals] - where Number_of_wavelength_intervals is the number of wavelength intervals.

Parameter.Description: Array of Maximum instrument degradation correction factors

Structure.Description: Dimensions: [Number_of_wavelength_intervals] - where Number_of_wavelength_intervals is the number of wavelength intervals.
